arts.ttl: Boadu "very happy" after second-half hat-trick against Leipzig
arts.sum: Myron Boadu was understandably over the moon after his second-half hat-trick earned Bochum a 3-3 draw against RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Rose on Leipzig squandering 3-0 lead against Bochum: "A question of professionalism"
arts.sum: Marco Rose had some honest and biting words for his RB Leipzig side after they let a 3-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 with Bochum.

arts.ttl: Dieter Hecking after Myron Boadu’s spectacular hat-trick: “He provided the right answers today.”
arts.sum: VfL Bochum head-coach Dieter Hecking - after berating his striker last week - was pleased to welcome striker Myron Boadu back into the fold following the Dutchman's hat trick in Saturday's spectacular comeback draw with Leipzig.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bayern, Stuttgart, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim; Bochum hold Leipzig in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: Matchday 19 brought a plentiful supply of goals and thrilling action to the Bundesrepublik. Stuttgart cruised to a big victory over Freiburg. Bayern, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim all bagged three vital points each. Bochum overturned a three-goal deficit to draw with Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Myron Boadu's hat-trick heroics help Bochum peg back Leipzig
arts.sum: Myron Boadu scored a stunning second-half hat-trick to earn Bochum an unlikely point after Dieter Hecking's side looked down and out at the break against Leipzig. Myron Boadu keeps his cool from the penalty spot, slotting home to complete his hat-trick and level the score at 3-3.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Sesko has already said yes to Arsenal transfer as deadline to sign him slashed
arts.sum: Injury-hit Arsenal are pondering whether to sign one of their summer transfer targets during the current transfer window, but have competition in the form of Barcelona

arts.ttl: Arsenal 'weighing up' £70m Benjamin Sesko move as Gunners step up striker search
arts.sum: Arsenal are reportedly considering whether to make a £70m bid to sign Slovenia international Benjamin Sesko from RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Arsenal get fresh incentive to complete money-spinning Benjamin Sesko transfer NOW
arts.sum: The Gunners have a list of targets that they are monitoring heading into the summer transfer window, but their need for a proven goalscorer could speed things up

arts.ttl: Official | RB Leipzig confirm permanent capture of Arthur Vermeeren: “Very comfortable in Leipzig from day one.”
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have confirmed the permanent purchase of Belgian midfielder Arthur Vermeeren.

arts.ttl: 'I've played with Man Utd star and La Liga goal machine - Benjamin Sesko is best I've seen'
arts.sum: Talk of RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko moving to the Premier League is intensifying, with Arsenal, Chelsea and Manchester United all monitoring the Slovenian closely
